resources.string: Will you allow %1$s to use your camera?
Will you allow %1$s to use your microphone?
Will you allow %1$s to use your camera and microphone?
Will you allow %1$s to access your location?
Will you allow %1$s to send notifications?
Will you allow %1$s to read your external storage?
Will you allow %1$s to store data in persistent storage?
You can specify which websites are allowed to open pop-up windows
The following sites are blocked from letting WebXR API access your VR device.
When you open a website which uses WebXR, you can open a dialog that lets you to block WebXR on that site.
Reset the sites not allowed to access Virtual Reality devices.
You’ve turned off protections on these websites.
When you allow a website to track your activity, they will appear here.
Reset the Exceptions for Enhanced Tracking Protection.
Logins that are not saved will be shown here
Logins that are not saved will be shown here.
Choose your preferred language for displaying pages
Choose your preferred language for voice search
Choose the language used to display menus, messages, and notifications.
Choose your preferred language for voice search.
Web pages are sometimes offered in more than one language. Choose the languages you want to display in order of preference to the left side.
You must restart %1$s in order to complete changes. Would you like to do that now?
Balanced for protection and performance. Pages will load normally.
Stronger protection, but may cause some sites or content to break.
Allow every page to follow you around online to collect you browsing habits and interests.
Choose what to synchronize on your devices using Firefox
Automatically allow sites to identify your device to play DRM-controlled content. (Learn More)
Restore tabs and windows after restart
This permission can only be disabled in system permissions
Allow %1$s to send technical and interaction data to Mozilla
Allow %1$s to send backlogged crash reports on your behalf
What would you like to search on the Web?
Example: Please say, “360 videos, weather, news…”
Please allow microphone access to use the Voice Search.
Search the Web or enter address
We had an issue and crashed
Please help Mozilla improve %1$s by sending your crash data. Learn More
Click the @ icon when you’re on a page to add it to your bookmarks.
External storage write permission is required to download files to the external storage
You can access your browsing history here
You can access your downloads here
An error occurred during download. Please try again.
Sign out of your Firefox Account?
When you sign out, you won’t be able to send or receive tabs from other devices. Your bookmarks and history will also stop syncing.
Clear history, bookmarks and logins from this device
Following websites have permission to open pop-up windows:
When you open a website with pop-up windows, you will see a dialog that lets you choose to block pop-up windows.
A list of sites with permissions will appear here.
When a login can be saved, you will see a dialog that lets you save it.
A list of the saved logins will appear here.
Press any other button to continue
Open link in a new window
Open link in a new tab

When you browse in a Private Window, %1$s does not save:

  • visited pages
  • searches
  • cookies
  • temporary files

Private Browsing doesn’t make you anonymous on the Internet. Your employer or Internet service provider can still know what page you visit.

Learn more about Private Browsing.
Check your device configuration to fix the problem.
Only %1$s windows can be open. Close one to open another.
%1$s does not have permission to run on this device and will now exit.
This page is asking to confirm that you want to leave. Data you have entered may not be saved.
Try reducing the window size to improve performance. Unblocking this page may crash your app.
Allow %1$s to Collect Voice Samples for Research?

In order to improve our voice recognition and other services, we need to collect voice samples for research. We store your data securely and without identifying information. You’ll always be able to use voice search, even if you don’t allow collection. Learn More
Would you like to show them anyways?
Don’t ask again for this site
Choose a device to send the tab.
Sign in or create a new Firefox Account to send tabs from Firefox on your desktop or mobile device to your headset.
Firefox Account also lets you sync bookmarks and history across all your devices.
A web page is slowing down your browser (%1$s). What would you like to do?
Popup blocking is %1$s for this site.
WebXR is %1$s for this site. Learn More
Enhanced Tracking Protection is %1$s for this site. Learn More
Some audio or video on this site uses DRM software, which may limit what %1$s can let you do with it. Learn More
Allowing DRM permits sites to identify this device every time you visit. Learn More
Are you sure you want to exit %1$s?
The file cannot be opened, Do you want to open it with an external application?
No application found to handle this file type.
Would you like to download this file?
Are you sure you want to delete this file?
Also delete the file from disk
Are you sure you want to delete all the downloaded files?
Also delete the files from disk
An error occurred while downloading %1$s. Please try again.
Permission to write the external storage is required to download the environment.
An error occurred while unzipping the environment.
Connect your HUAWEI VR Glass to use this app
